title: Analysing domain suitability of a sentiment lexicon by identifying distributionally bipolar words
authors: L Flekova, E Ruppert, D Preotiuc-Pietro - 6TH WORKSHOP ON  …
excerpt: Abstract Contemporary sentiment analysis approaches rely heavily on lexicon based methods. This is mainly due to their simplicity, although the best empirical results can be achieved by more complex techniques. We introduce a method to assess suitability of  ...
